scripts.tournament: export $(cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx tsx scripts/tournament.ts
scripts.tournament:check: export $(cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx tsx scripts/tournament.ts check
scripts.tournament:dry-run: export $(cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx tsx scripts/tournament.ts dry-run
scripts.tournament:run: export $(cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx tsx scripts/tournament.ts run
scripts.tournament:resume: export $(cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx tsx scripts/tournament.ts resume
scripts.tournament:verify-stats: export $(cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx tsx scripts/tournament.ts verify-stats
scripts.tournament:recalculate-stats: export $(cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx tsx scripts/tournament.ts recalculate-stats
